name: Pixel Forge (Fonxs)
description:
Prepare to engage in a strategic battle unlike any other. This card game requires cunning and resourcefulness as players collect precious resources and unleash an array of powerful cards to construct their own kingdom and decimate their adversary. Each zone on the board holds a unique power, allowing players to manipulate the game in their favor. But beware, one misstep could lead to utter destruction at the hands of the enemy's ruthless minions. Will you emerge victorious or fall to the might of your opponent's army? The fate of your kingdom hangs in the balance.

This is a card game where players collect resources and deploy various cards to build their own army and defeat their opponent. There are pre-defined zones on the board where cards can be placed.

GameCode:

https://gitlab.com/Fonx/cardgame-pigsquadgamejam

Made with Unity (C#).

Min Players:2.
